data.name: 最后一回合 Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a pixel-style puzzle game.
You control a number of units on an NXN board, using terrain, positioning, special abilities (such as pan moves, etc.) to attack enemies, protect the crystals, and win.
You can also customize levels, create your own levels, and accept challenges from others.
The game progresses in levels, each with a different terrain and enemies that require a lot of thought.

The key features

  • Custom levels: Create a battlefield of your own for everyone to challenge.
  • Rich terrain: A variety of terrain, combined into a rich strategy.。

Other

Some of the resources come from resource stores and are authorized.

data.short_description: This is a pixel-style puzzle game. You will control several units on an NXN board, using terrain, positioning, special abilities, etc., to attack the enemy, protect the crystal, and achieve the final victory. You can also customize levels, create your own levels, and accept challenges from others.

fullgame.name: 最后一回合 The Last Round

data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
